demolition

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.Bomb

  • public class Bomb
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bomb(int x, int y, int i_pos, int j_pos, processing.core.PImage[][] sprites, Map map)
      Constructor for bomb object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkContact()
      Checks explosion for any contact between the player or enemies.
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
      To be executed once every frame, draws the bomb
      void explode()
      Creates explosion objects for every grid tile that the explosion extends to, and checks whether explosion can continue
      void sprite_cycle()
      To be executed once every frame by tick(), cycles the sprite by moving to the next PImage in the PImage[] array
      boolean tick()
      To be executed once every frame, decrements timers, calls sprite_cycle() per execution and calls explode() once exploded.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb(int x,
            int y,
            int i_pos,
            int j_pos,
            processing.core.PImage[][] sprites,
            Map map)
        Constructor for bomb object
        Parameters:
        x - x position of the bomb, amount of pixels to the right (for drawing)
        y - y position of the bomb, amount of pixels downwards (for drawing)
        i_pos - the row within the map array where bomb is located
        j_pos - the column within the map array where bomb is located
        sprites - the sprite array with first row an array of bomb sprites and second row an array of explosion sprites to be cycled
        map - the map object that the bomb is placed within

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public boolean tick()
        To be executed once every frame, decrements timers, calls sprite_cycle() per execution and calls explode() once exploded.
        Returns:
        true if explosion made contact with player

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app)
        To be executed once every frame, draws the bomb
        Parameters:
        app - of PApplet

      • sprite_cycle

        public void sprite_cycle()
        To be executed once every frame by tick(), cycles the sprite by moving to the next PImage in the PImage[] array

      • explode

        public void explode()
        Creates explosion objects for every grid tile that the explosion extends to, and checks whether explosion can continue

      • checkContact

        public boolean checkContact()
        Checks explosion for any contact between the player or enemies. If explosion makes contact with enemies, enemies are moved from the map's enemies array and transferred to enemies_dead, no longer rendered. If explosion makes contact with player, BombGuy.kill() is called.
        Returns:
        true if explosion makes contact with player.
